name: zyeon-ai-realtime
description: ZYEON AI - Real-time Voice Assistant with React frontend and Flask backend

scripts.install: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../backend/src/static/
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python src/main.py
scripts.test: cd backend && python -m pytest tests/ || echo 'No tests found'

author: ZYEON AI Team
